hero.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
hero.subtitle: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and nature in our premium caravan park nestled in the heart of the countryside.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage
welcome.content:
Nestled in the picturesque countryside, Lamb Cottage Caravan Park offers the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our family-run park has been welcoming guests for over 20 years, providing a peaceful retreat where you can reconnect with nature and create lasting memories.

Whether you're looking for a weekend getaway or an extended holiday, our well-maintained facilities and friendly atmosphere ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all our guests.

tagline.description: Experience comfort, tranquility, and adventure in our beautiful countryside setting.

reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our happy guests

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Absolutely wonderful stay! The facilities were spotless and the staff incredibly friendly. We'll definitely be back next year.
items.comment: Absolutely wonderful stay! The facilities were spotless and the staff incredibly friendly. We'll definitely be back next year.

items.name: Mike Thompson
items.text: Perfect location for exploring the countryside. Our kids loved the play area and we appreciated the peaceful atmosphere.
items.comment: Perfect location for exploring the countryside. Our kids loved the play area and we appreciated the peaceful atmosphere.

items.name: Emma Wilson
items.text: Great value for money. Clean facilities and beautiful surroundings. The on-site shop was very convenient.
items.comment: Great value for money. Clean facilities and beautiful surroundings. The on-site shop was very convenient.
